title: Upgrade
content:
## [Latest version](#latest-version)

To update to the latest version of Next.js, you can use the `upgrade` codemod:

Terminal

```
npx @next/codemod@canary upgrade latest
```

If you prefer to upgrade manually, install the latest Next.js and React versions:

Terminal

```
npm i next@latest react@latest react-dom@latest eslint-config-next@latest
```
preview: To update to the latest version of Next.js, you can use the `upgrade` codemod: Terminal [Code Block] If you prefer to upgrade manually, install the latest Next.js and React versions: Terminal [Code Block]

title: Upgrade
content:
## [Canary version](#canary-version)

To update to the latest canary, make sure you're on the latest version of Next.js and everything is working as expected. Then, run the following command:

Terminal

```
npm i next@canary
```
preview: To update to the latest canary, make sure you're on the latest version of Next.js and everything is working as expected. Then, run the following command: Terminal [Code Block]
